title: ASL 1.8 — Family & Relationships
objectives: Learn family signs: MOTHER, FATHER, BROTHER, SISTER, FRIEND.

sections.prompt: Create a 3-line family introduction: 'MY MOTHER + descriptor. MY BROTHER + descriptor. MY FRIEND + descriptor.'
Which was hardest — remembering gender-based signs or sequencing family terms?

quiz.q: What is the possessive sign for 'our'?

reflectionPrompt: Upload a 30s clip introducing 3 family members with descriptors.
